name: Desert Simulator
description:
This is the Desert Simulator, you walk around in a desert with full of sand, palm trees and a little water in it. how cool & great is that?

There a 3 type that you can try like normal, sanic, and no gravity version in it. If press "shift" button it won't do anything, Back to main menu press "esc", and out of bounds will be respawn.

Controls: WASD / Arrow Key for Walking.
